block_comment: This block of code implements a logical OR operation to update the internal status. It merges two status signals, `status_update_int_reg` and `genlocked_int_reg`, into a single output `status_update_int`. When either `status_update_int_reg` or `genlocked_int_reg` is high, the resulting `status_update_int` will also be high, effectively indicating an updated status derived from the two individual conditions.
